overview: Until 2006, Zippi was part of the IBM EMEA Corporate Development team, and in charge of IBM’s venture investments and proactive business development in Europe, the Middle East, and Africa. Previously, Zippi managed IBM’s venture investments in Israel. Prior to that role between the years 1993-2000 she was general counsel for IBM Israel and IBM Haifa Research Labs. Her duties also included overlooking the Contracts & Negotiations department as well as managing the legal affairs of IBM Greece and IBM Cyprus. She received her LLb. (Summa Cum Laude) from the Hebrew University of Jerusalem and interned at the Supreme Court of Justice.
